divs: Sighting Detailsone evening my wife and i were at my father in laws house visiting, and when we left we decided to sit in this yard and look at the stars. he lives on top of a big hill and the view is wonderful,as we gazed i noticed in the distance lightes on top of the mountain. i though it was people in a four wheel drive vehical, until the lightes came up out of the trees vertical with the tops of them. the lightes went down to the ground and then back up again, this went on for 15 minutes and then disopered.my wife and i were puzzeled that night but even more so the next day, because my friend lives at the foot of jacks mountain we asked him to take us to the top of the mountain wear the road is. his reply was what are you talking about there is no road up there. then he told us that people have bin seeing thing for years in fergason valley. this hole event has taken place in a small town in the middle of pennsylvania called lewistown. people in lewistown are very conservative like any other small town. but i have heard stories for years, and i would love to see someone investigate. just resently i heard the lights over mc vaytown were back, similar story to my just on the next mountain over. this sighting was heavily reported people claimed they seen black hellicopters checking out the area.let me know what you think. if there is any confuson about my address, i now live in philly and when i have any vacation we take my son to lewistown to visit with grandparents. craig bandy
